Articles.Content: I'm new to the modding scene, And I want to know: Is Curseforge considered, in general, to be a Safe site to download from? the fact that the "Get Mods!" tab above links to it is a good sign, but I just want to be sure. If it isn't (for some reason), are there any sites you guys could recommend?

@RobinOfLoxley Yes, Curseforge is safe, and is the "official" KSP mod host. However, IMHO, SpaceDock is *much* better than Curseforge. There are also MANY mods that are only listed on the forum and hosted only on Github.

https://spacedock.info/kerbal-space-program
